original_title: Chief Incumbent of Mihintale Rajamaha Viharaya at CID to lodge complaints
original_body_lines: The Chief Incumbent of the Mihintale Rajamaha Viharaya, Ven. Dr. Walawahengunawe Dhammarathana Thero, arrived at the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) a short while ago (18).
This according to Ada Derana reporter is to lodge two complaints with the CID.
